params.name: startDateTime
params.label: Start of the data retrieval range - Timestamp in ISO 8601

params.name: endDateTime
params.label: End of the data retrieval range - Timestamp in ISO 8601

params.name: TMV1Filter
params.label: TMV1 Filter for retrieving a subset of the collected Observed Attack Techniques events.
params.description: Example: (riskLevel eq 'high') and (endpointName eq 'my-computer')'. Check https://automation.trendmicro.com/xdr/api-v3#tag/Observed-Attack-Techniques/paths/~1v3.0~1oat~1detections/get for filter syntax.
